com.brightcove.onceux

Class OnceUxComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent
      • com.brightcove.onceux.OnceUxComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class OnceUxComponent
extends AbstractComponent
    Provide a class to support the Brightcove Server Side Ad Insetion (SSAI) functionality, i.e. given a URL to a VMAP server, ensure that the player hides player controls, provides tracking beacons, allows clickthrough and clickthrough tracking during ad playback.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.brightcove.player.event.AbstractComponent

        eventEmitter, listenerTokens

      • OnceUxComponent

                       BaseVideoView videoView,
                       com.brightcove.player.onceux.ProtocolType protocol,
                       com.brightcove.player.onceux.FormatType format)
        Create a new Brightcove Media Once UX plugin for the supplied Android context and video view.
        Parameters:
        context - The given Android context set up by the Application.
        videoView - The player object rendering the video provided via the SDK.
        protocol - The Once protocol choice.
        format - The Once data format choice.

    • Method Detail

      • processVideo

        public void processVideo(Video video)
                  throws NoSourceFoundException
        Process a video that has a VMAP url in at least one if its sources.
        Parameters:
        video - the video to play.
        Throws:
        NoSourceFoundException - if no VMAP url was found in neither of the Video Sources.
        See Also:
        Source

      • processVideo

        public void processVideo(java.lang.String adDataUrl)
        Process a video given an ad metadata URL and a content URL. Default to using the VMAP technology and XML data bindings.
        Parameters:
        adDataUrl - The given VMAP ad server URL.
